metadata.text1:
Neutral position & suctioning 
Put on oxygen
metadata.text2:
If BS < 45 mg/dl or < 2.5 mmol/L give IV 10% glucose at 2ml/kg

If possible take blood for Ca, Mg, FBC and do full infection screen
metadata.text3:
- Give phenobarbitone 20mg/kg IM 
- Repeat loading dose if necessary
- If seizures still ongoing - give maintenance phenobarbitone 5mg/kg PO/IM

When seizures have stopped and baby stable click the blue arrow to continue
